name: Space Robot Samurai Zombie Slayer
description: We are not alone in the universe, its filled with Zombies! To combat them mankind invented their most efficient weapon yet: the Space Robot Samurai Zombie Slayer. ONLY YOU can pilot the powerful Space Robot Samurai Zombie Slayer to fight the Space Zombie horde!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Or Later Processor: Intel 2 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 41 MB available space

reviews.review_text: First 10 Minutes ingame. Ranked 29 In Global.
